H0.text: Who was President of France for over 10 years from 1958. Georges Pompidou

H1.text: Who was President of France for over 10 years from 1958. François Mitterrand

H2.text: Who was President of France for over 10 years from 1958. Valéry Giscard d'Estaing

H3.text: Who was President of France for over 10 years from 1958. DeGaulle

A4.text: François Mitterrand served as President of France from 1981 to 1995.

A5.text: François Mitterrand's presidency lasted 14 years, making him the longest-serving president in French history.

A6.text: Georges Pompidou served as President of France from 1969 until his death in 1974.

A7.text: Charles de Gaulle served as President of France from 1959 to 1969.

A8.text: Valéry Giscard d'Estaing served as President of France from 1974 to 1981.
